name: Trick or Treat! (DerpyDooDesigns)
description:
In this micro game your objective is simple: Get as much Candy as possible!

Freely explore the town of Trick or Treat!
Talk to the inhabitants!
Knock on everyone's door!
Complete mini quests!
Get robbed!
Steal money!
Eat garbage!
Click on the credits to waste your time!

It's a very simple game made within 24hours. If there's any game breaking bugs or something doesn't work then I'll fix it but I have no plans on adding more content.
